stages.logText: The priest in Stoutford looks scared of me and of what I did, but we never met before. Can this have something to do with Andor?
The priest's acolyte, Yolgen, told me that Andor was here a while ago, and since then, scary noises resonate in the church, seemingly coming from underground.
A member of the Thieve's Guild in the tavern of Stoutford told me that the tavern owner dealt with Andor.
Glasforn, the owner of the tavern of Stoutford, admits to knowing Andor, but evades all my questions by boasting about his beds' quality.
After sleeping in Glasforn's bed, I woke up in a cave, and was attacked by a monster. I killed it, but I should go see Glasforn again.
When Glasforn saw me, he was really scared. Hopefully I'll get some information from him.
I confronted Glasforn. He admited everything, but blamed Andor for it. How can Andor be involved in this?
Yolgen told me the rumbles have stopped. I should talk to the priest.
The priest told me the monster was a lich. I should keep its heart safe.
The priest thanked me for saving his church and asked who the culprit was.
I told him I do not know who was responsible.
I told him Glasforn was responsible.
I told him Andor was responsible.
